thread.title: Zosia’s abortion blackmail agony and 9 more big Holby City spoilers
thread.title_full: Zosia’s abortion blackmail agony and 9 more big Holby City spoilers

author: Duncan Lindsay
title: Zosia’s abortion blackmail agony and 9 more big Holby City spoilers
text:
(Picture: BBC) There’s heartbreak and conflict ahead in Holby City tonight as Zosia’s devastating abortion secret weighs heavily on her – especially when Isaac discovers what she is keeping from Ollie. Will he split the couple up for good as the truth comes out? 
Meanwhile, Essie has a lot to deal with when Parker goes on the run and seeks her help with a friend of his named Asia – but what has happened to Asia and might Essie end up just as deep in trouble as Parker?
There’s also a new headache for Fletch, heartbreak for Dom and Serena finds an unexpected ally. Here’s what’s ahead as the drama on the wards continues:
(Picture: BBC) 1. Parker has run away and Essie is shocked when he confronts her and tells her that he needs her help to look after a friend of his, Asia, who is living with him. 
2. Zosia is racked with guilt and emotion following her abortion but Isaac forces her hand by implying that she is pregnant to Ollie. Zosia reluctantly tells Ollie about the pregnancy but can’t tell him any more but when Isaac then discovers that she had an abortion, he determines to use it as leverage against her.
3. Fletch spots Serena having an agitated phone call with a mobile company who is trying to charge her for Elinor’s phone contract. Fletch tries to reach out to her but she insists that she is fine and powers through her grief. 
(Picture: BBC) 4. After Isaac blackmails her, Zosia is forced to come clean to a stunned Ollie about the abortion and he is left shattered by her secrecy. Is there any way back for the couple or could this see them divided forever?
(Picture: BBC) 5. Asia is brought into hospital and Essie tries her best to help her but it soon turns out that Asia’s story is a lot more complicated than what Parker made out. As Essie makes some shocking discoveries about Asia, will she find herself out of her depth? 
6. Crushed by Zosia’s revelation and feeling betrayed, Ollie seeks solace with Jasmine and, as the pair get drunk together, Jasmine listens to his woes. What will she advise and might she and Ollie grow closer?
(Picture: BBC) 7. Fletch is irked to hear that Evie isn’t at Sports Camp but gets a surprise when she turns up at the hospital with an injury. Not wanting to bother Serena, he treats her but Serena soon gets to the bottom of what has brought Evie to the hospital. 
8. Zosia is angry at Dom for telling Isaac about her pregnancy and rails at him that he has betrayed her trust. Is Dom about to lose one of his closest friendships right when he needs it more than ever?
9. In the wake of what happens with Asia, Essie is left reeling and Sacha comforts her. Meanwhile Parker makes a decision about his future as he realises that he can’t keep running away – but will is be what Essie wants to hear? 
(Picture: BBC) 10. Serena finds herself an understanding ally in Evie as the pair have a heart to heart. As Serena starts to confront her grief and admits how much she misses Elinor, Evia has some helpful advice for her ‘auntie’ Serena that may help her onto the road to recovery.
MORE: Holby City spoilers: First look as three familiar soap faces arrive on the wards
